ygData.subject: Re: Duel Weild & Sta.
ygData.msgSnippet: Bronze has the same AC as plate, but weight is a lot more ... From: Dean Boyle  Oh! Then I m getting rid of my blacken armor and getting
ygData.messageBody:
Bronze has the same AC as plate, but weight is a lot more

>>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.25.99 5:34:06 PM >>>
From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>

Oh! Then I'm getting rid of my blacken armor and getting banded. AH whats
about Bronze is that any good?


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Duel Weild & Sta.
Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 15:12:40 -0500

From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>

I'm pretty sure that banded is lighter and higher AC. I know because I had
a full set of banded, then when I got the full set of blackend, by AC
dropped and I can only now carry 10, where as before I could carry a
conciderable ammount more, somewhere in the range of 30....

>>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.25.99 2:34:04 PM >>>
From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>

Well I did group up with 2 other guild members that where lvl 15 and lvl 19
and we splited the armor, man it took a whole day just to get a whole suit
but now my MAX weight is 98 nd with nothing in Inv. with no wepons and just
armor on I weight ohh.. just about 48 lbs. NOT BAD and the AC is fer points
up from Banded, I think the Banded Tunic is 12 and black armor is I think 16
I'm not sure.

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Duel Weild & Sta.
Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 17:18:03 +0900

From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

Id recommend level 20+ people hunt the goblin elites for that black stuff.

Your one bad ass if you hunted them at level 12! They conned red to me at
level 18.

:)

> ----------
> From: Dean Boyle[SMTP:gino_14@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 11:35 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Duel Weild & Sta.
>
> From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
> When I get Duel Weild I'm prob. going to go with the best Mino. Batlle
> Axe
> couse it does a wooping 8dmg/35delay and with my secondary wepon I'll
> prob.
> use a Fine Steel Long Sword OR a barbed whip OR a combine long sword.
>
> P.S Could someone please tellme the specs. on the Fine Stell Long Sword,
> Combine Long Sword and Barbed Whip?
>
>
> How do you cheack my skill in sta. and how do I get that skill up.
>
> P.S I also found that using kick often in a row draws your sta. down,
but
> if
> you use bash is dosn't seem to bring sta. down as much as kick.
>
> I've just got Perry skill and put 3 skill points into it. Is this
> automatic and I've never seen it been used. Is this skill even working
> and
> is the skill going up?
>
> I've just gotten Blacken Armor and replaced it with my banded and
> ringmail
> armor! Man, the weight is so much lighter and the AC is much more
better!
>
> I suggest any lvl 12+ people go to the RiverVale area hunt though
goblines
>
> and get that armor! + is looks so cool!
>
